text: Blood Ties () is a 1964 Soviet drama film directed by Mikhail Yershov.Прибалтийские актёры, которых очень любили в СССРВ преддверии Дня Победы в Москве пройдут бесплатные киносеансы: что и где посмотретьРодная кровь == Plot == The film tells about Sergeant Vladimir Fedotov and a ferryman named Sonya, who met during the war and fell in love with each other.Родная кровь == Cast == * Yevgeny Matveev as Sergeant Vladimir Feddotov * Vija Artmane as Sonya, a ferryman * Tanya Doronina * Vera Povetkina * Anatoliy Papanov * Nikolai Morozov * Andrei Danilov * Yuri Fisenko as Erik (as Yura Fisenko) * Vera Povetkina * Igor SelyhuzhonokРодная кровь (1964) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1964 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: Blood Ties (1964 film)
